basic.floral_language:
Ornithogalum umbellatum
Floriography: health, longevity, vitality 
Ornithogalum umbellatum is a kind of evergreen foliage plants. Because of its sleek large blades it is appreciated by the public. 
Ornithogalum umbellatum plant stature is elegant, has many branches. Leaf blades are elliptic, slightly leathery, dark green, decorated with white or light yellow patches on the surface, which greatly increase the ornamental value.   Ornithogalum umbellatum is resistant to shade, is suitable for the scattered light in the bright place. Maintained properly, it also can flower during May and June. Flowers are pale yellow.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, sometimes flowers in May-June, white flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat mixed with coarse sand soil
maintenance.sunlight: Relatively resistant to shade, likes half shade environments
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, avoid saturated water, reduce watering and fertilization in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply 1-2 times monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and yellowish leaves timely
